name: 8-Bit Soul Eater
description:
You are a Clydenth Soul Collector who is tasked with Protecting the Soul Eaters, the creatures that devour souls and release them to the underworld.

Each Lunar Cycle, Soul Eaters go through the Moonsilet Ritual, which requires them to release the souls into the underworld.  During this ritual, the Soul Eaters become vulnerable and are unable to defend themselves, so that call upon the Soul Collectors to protect them from the Synarounth's, the sworn enemies of the Clydenth's.  Hordes of Synarounth's attack each Lunar Cycle with the objective of releasing soul's from the Soul Eater and allowing them ascend, with also the hope of killing Soul Eaters.

The Controls:

  • Movement => AWSD, Arrow Keys, Gamepad-Directional
  • Jump => SPACE, J, Z, GamePad-B
  • Fire => H, K, X, GamePad-A
